title: Did the Mayor of Minneapolis cancel the fireworks on July 4, but allow the sacrifice of a Muslim animal in the Viking Stadium?
subtitle: A series of false news, a lack of understanding of flawed reading, and a rush of fanatical fear of Islam resulted in excessive accusations against the Mayor of Minneapolis.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The mayor of Minneapolis did not allow fireworks on July 4, but allowed "Muslim animal sacrifice" on the Viking Stadium.
